properties.description: Transform the population data by age

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{indic_de,geo\time} as string,
		{2008 } as double,
		{2009 } as double,
		{2010 } as double,
		{2011 } as double,
		{2012 } as double,
		{2013 } as double,
		{2014 } as double,
		{2015 } as double,
		{2016 } as double,
		{2017 } as double,
		{2018 } as double,
		{2019 } as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PopulationByAge
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CountrySource
PopulationByAge derive(Age_By_Group = substring(split({indic_de,geo\time},',')[1],4),
		Country_Code = split({indic_de,geo\time},',')[2],
		{2019_Mod} = coalesce({2019 },0)) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn select(mapColumn(
		Age_By_Group,
		Country_Code,
		{2019} = {2019_Mod}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqFields
SelectReqFields filter(length(Country_Code) == 2) ~> FilterCountryCode
FilterCountryCode pivot(groupBy(Country_Code),
	pivotBy(Age_By_Group, ['Y0_14', 'Y15_24', 'Y25_49', 'Y50_64', 'Y65_79', 'Y80_MAX']),
	{} = sum({2019}),
	columnNaming: '$V$N',
	lateral: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PivotAgeGroup
PivotAgeGroup, CountrySource lookup(Country_Code == country_code_2_digit,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupForCountryCode
LookupForCountryCode select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		Age_Group_0_14 = Y0_14,
		Age_Group_15_24 = Y15_24,
		Age_Group_25_49 = Y25_49,
		Age_Group_50_64 = Y50_64,
		Age_Group_65_79 = Y65_79,
		Age_Group_80_MAZ = Y80_MAX
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqFieldForCountryCode
SelectReqFieldForCountryCode sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['processed_population_by_age'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PopByAgeSink
